titles.title: World War I Veterans Medal of Honor Justice Act
To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/25/2001--Introduced. Instructs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to: (1) extend to September 24, 2002, the time period during which a certain licensee is required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio; and (2) extend such time period for two consecutive two-year periods upon licensee request.Provides for reinstatement of such license if it has expired.
